price: Isaan irraa namoota gara kee dhageeffatantu jira. Sila ati namoota gurri duude,dhageessiftaa? odoo isaan sammuu hin qabnellee.
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَسۡتَمِعُونَ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yastamiʿūna ilayka afa-anta tus'miʿu al-ṣuma walaw kānū lā yaʿqilūna
